title: What Are the Toxic Traits of a Pisces Man?

steps.title: Pisces men can take things personally.
steps.content: Pisces men can take things personally. They’re extremely sensitive to criticism, and they tend to feel like a victim. [1] X Research source This can be tough on romantic partners, who might feel like they’re walking on eggshells. Sensitivity can be both a strength and a weakness. You can’t change it, but you can understand it and adapt together. If you’re dealing with a sensitive man , validate his feelings while reminding him that you’re not trying to attack. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Pisces men feel everything deeply, including sadness.
steps.content: Pisces men feel everything deeply, including sadness. They can be melancholy sometimes. If left unresolved, it may bring down the moods of the people around them. [3] X Research source If you’re dealing with a moody Pisces man, let him know you care, and give him space if he needs it. If you think he's struggling with depression, encourage him to seek out treatment right away.

steps.title: Pisces men might disappear without explanation.
steps.content: Pisces men might disappear without explanation. In fact, as expert astrologer Angel Eyedealism explains, Pisces is “the sign that can ghost better than any other.” They're “all about vibes and instincts,” so if they feel like they’ve caught a bad vibe, they run for the hills rather than staying to figure things out. If you’re dealing with being ghosted by a Pisces man, it’s completely normal to feel hurt. Remember, people ghost for all kinds of reasons, and it has nothing to do with how special you are! [4] X Research source Try reciting positive affirmations to show yourself some kindness and build up self-love as you move forward.

steps.title: A Pisces man is slow to reveal his true self.
steps.content: A Pisces man is slow to reveal his true self. When he’s getting to know you, he may spend the entire conversation asking about you. [5] X Research source Although this focus on you can be flattering, you may feel frustrated that he isn't opening up yet. If you’re getting to know a Pisces man, be patient with him. Once he trusts you, a Pisces man will be super open and emotionally present. It just takes a bit longer for him to get there!

steps.title: Pisceans have a hard time staying grounded in reality.
steps.content: Pisceans have a hard time staying grounded in reality. Ruled by Neptune, the planet of illusion, Pisceans have rich fantasy lives. [6] X Research source They spend a lot of time daydreaming, and they may miss out on amazing real connections because they’re stuck imagining fantasy ones. [7] X Research source If you have a crush on a Pisces man, be bold and tell him how you feel . This could snap him out of his daydreams and show him that an amazing partner is right in front of him!

steps.title: Like all mutable signs, Pisceans struggle with consistency.
steps.content: Like all mutable signs, Pisceans struggle with consistency. Because of their dreamy, scatter-brained energy, Pisces men may show up late to plans or forget about them altogether. [8] X Research source If you’re dealing with a flaky Pisces man, remind yourself that it’s not because he doesn’t care. Try suggesting that he keeps a daily planner, or send him a reminder text when you have plans.If you’re dating a Pisces man who is always on time, this is a great sign! He’s likely come up with a good system to keep track of his commitments.

steps.title: Pisces men can be overly-attached to their partners.
steps.content: Pisces men can be overly-attached to their partners. When Pisces men fall in love, they fall in love deeply and want to be super close to their partners. [9] X Research source In some cases, this intensity can leave their partners feeling suffocated. If you’re dealing with a clingy Pisces man, don’t be afraid to tell him you need a bit of space. Remind him that this is not a rejection of him, and that alone time is necessary for healthy relationships. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Pisces men may over-indulge in unhealthy things.
steps.content: Pisces men may over-indulge in unhealthy things. It can be difficult to feel things as deeply as Pisceans do, so it’s no surprise that they look to things like alcohol, comfort foods, or even drugs for an escape. When this becomes excessive, it can take a toll on their relationships. If you want to help a Pisces man cut back on alcohol , try out a 2 week sober challenge together. Make delicious mocktails or check out sober events in your area to keep things exciting and fun!

steps.title: Pisces men tend to be people-pleasers.
steps.content: Pisces men tend to be people-pleasers. They'll go out of their way for others at the expense of their own mental health. [11] X Research source This can leave them resentful, burnt out, and complaining to you about the situation they’ve put themselves in. [12] X Research source If you’re dealing with a people-pleasing Pisces man, encourage him to set healthy boundaries with the people around him.If the Pisces man in your life has healthy boundaries with people, this is definitely a green flag! It’s a sign that he’s done the work to combat his people-pleasing nature.

steps.title: Pisces men can be too flirtatious.
steps.content: Pisces men can be too flirtatious. Like all water signs, Pisceans love connecting emotionally with people. A Pisces man might take this too far and connect with someone who isn't his partner. This can be hurtful even if he isn't physically unfaithful. [13] X Research source If you're entering a relationship with a Pisces man, have a conversation early on about what constitutes cheating for you. Coming up with a definition together can help you avoid misunderstandings. [14] X Research source If you’re dating a Pisces man who is careful not to flirt with others, this is a great sign of self-awareness. It also shows that he is serious about being respectful toward you.
